name: Frightfur Vendor
text: This card's name becomes "Toy Vendor" while on the field or in the GY. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card; draw 1 card and reveal it, and if it is an "Edge Imp" monster, you can destroy 1 card on the field. Otherwise, place 1 card from your hand on either the top or bottom of the Deck. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; its ATK becomes halved until the end of this turn.
